main event: On December 17, 1965, a red light flickering was observed in Sabina, Ohio.
interesting points: The object was reported to have a small green light along with the red light., The object was moving very fast., The duration of the observation was around 2-3 minutes., There was a soft whirring sound noted by the observer., The physical evidence was reported as absent.
sighted object: one flickering red light with a small green light
